articles.title: Top insurance CEO announces that white male new hires must be personally signed off by herself, as part of the firm’s drive to improve diversity - Fortune
articles.description: There is “no non-diverse hire" at Aviva that hasn't been "signed off by me and the chief people officer,” the blue-chip company's CEO Amanda Blanc revealed
articles.content: As businesses push forward on hitting diversity goals, a major insurance company in the U.K. is telling its 22,000 strong workforce that senior white male new hires must be personally approved by non… [+5437 chars]
